title: Which of the following is a security vulnerability that occurs when a web application does not properly validate or sanitize user input?
What is the purpose of a firewall in network security?
options: To prevent unauthorized access to a network
To detect and remove malware from a network
To authenticate users on a network

title: What is a common method used by hackers to gain unauthorized access to a system by exploiting a software vulnerability?
What is the term used to describe a security attack where an attacker attempts to guess a password by systematically trying all possible combinations?
What is the main goal of a DDoS (Distributed Denial-of-Service) attack?
options: Gain unauthorized access to a system
Disrupt or disable the targeted system or network
Install malicious software on the victim's computer
